name: NishikinoMaki
title: 题解 P1085 【不高兴的津津】

content:
2004的NOIP真的好人性化啊
********
是学生都会像津津一样有补习班
~~（当我没说）~~
------------


```
var 
  i,max,b,c,ans:longint;
begin
    max:=0; //初始化最大值
    ans:=0; //初始化最大值的那一天
    
    for i:=1 to 7 do 
      begin
        readln(b,c);
        if (b+c)>8 then //津津如果一天上课超过八个小时就会不高兴
          if max<(b+c-8) then //上得越久就会越不高兴,这里不能写(=)等于号，
                              //因为如果有两天或两天以上不高兴的程度相当，则输出时间最靠前的一天。
             begin
                 max:=b+c-8;//最不高兴的那一天
                 ans:=i;//最不高兴的那一天
             end;
             
      end;
      
    writeln(ans);//输出那一天
end.
```


纯模拟，值得信赖

name: ErkkiErkko
title: 题解 P1085 【不高兴的津津】

content:
### p1085 python basic-ans
```
# array a,b & int flag
# a: memory for input
# b：memory for adds of each element in a
# flag: check first output

a = []
b = []
flag = 0

# iterate to input
for i in range(7):
    a.append(input().split(" ")) # split out input then add to arrayA
    b.append(int(a[i][0])+int(a[i][1]))	# add each element then add to arrayB
    if ((b[i] > 8) & (flag == 0)): # check the first output
        flag = flag + 1
        print(i+1)
        
```

name: 未来miss
title: 题解 P1085 【不高兴的津津】

content:
# Python的题解 小白：
```python
global Time
Time = 0
global Day
Day = 0
global Flag
Flag = False
def JudgeUnHappy(School, Plan, JudgeDay):
    global Time
    global Day
    global Flag
    Total_time = School + Plan
    if (Total_time > 8):
        Flag = True
        if (Total_time > Time):
            Time = Total_time
            Day = JudgeDay

def main():
    n = 1
    while (n <= 7):
        School, Plan = map(int,input().split())
        JudgeUnHappy(School, Plan, n)
        n += 1

    if Flag:
        print(Day)
    else:
        print("0")
main()

```

name: 88888a
title: 题解 P1085 【不高兴的津津】

content:
```cpp
var
   i,c,b,ans:longint;
   a:array[1..7]of longint;、//记录每天的上课时间总和
begin
      ans:=0;
      for i:=1 to 7 do
      begin
           readln(c,b);//读入
           a[i]:=c+b;//计算总和
           if a[i]>8 then inc(ans);//判断不高兴天数
      end;
      if ans=0 then writeln(0) else //零次
      if ans>=1 then
      begin
           for i:=1 to 7 do
           if a[i]>8 then 
           begin
               writeln(i);  //大于等于1直接输出第一个
               halt;//接着结束整个程序
           end;
   end;
end.//程序终止

```
name: HeMeng
title: 题解 P1085 【不高兴的津津】
